Use for single endpoints, directory scans of .bru files, or when writing docs to a specific output path.

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based documentation skill with no executable code. The SKILL.md defines behavior only - no scripts, network calls, credential access, or code execution capabilities beyond standard AI tools.

content.user_title: Generate API docs from Bruno files
content.value_statement: Manually documenting API endpoints from Bruno tests and Django code is time-consuming and error-prone. This skill automatically generates comprehensive documentation by analyzing .bru files and correlating them with Django implementations.
actual_capabilities: Parse Bruno (.bru) files to extract HTTP methods, URLs, headers, parameters, and request bodies
Scan directories recursively for all .bru files
Locate Django REST Framework or Django Ninja endpoint implementations in source code
Generate markdown documentation with line-numbered code references
Document authentication, permissions, and multi-tenant filtering logic
Create frontend integration examples with TypeScript and React Query
limitations: Designed for Django backends only (DRF or Django Ninja)
Requires access to the Django source codebase for implementation mapping
Cannot generate documentation without corresponding source code files
Output format is fixed to markdown documentation structure

faq.question: What Django versions are supported?
faq.answer: Works with any Django version using DRF or Django Ninja for API endpoints.

faq.question: How many endpoints can it document at once?
faq.answer: No hard limit. Use --scan to process unlimited .bru files recursively.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing documentation tools?
faq.answer: Outputs markdown that can be integrated with any static site generator or docs platform.

faq.question: Does it modify source files?
faq.answer: No. Read-only operation. Use --output to write generated documentation separately.

faq.question: Why are my line numbers incorrect?
faq.answer: Ensure the Django source code matches what was scanned. Line numbers reflect actual file content.

faq.question: How is this different from Swagger/OpenAPI generators?
faq.answer: This uses Bruno test files as the source of truth, not code annotations. Provides business logic context and frontend integration examples.
